statements: DELETE FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_id = 101 AND drone_id = 201;
DELETE FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01' AND estimated_duration > 5;
DELETE FROM maintenance_records WHERE drone_id = 101 AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_date >= '2022-05-01' AND drone_id IN (SELECT drone_id FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_task = 'Battery Replacement');
DELETE FROM MaintenanceRecord WHERE task_id = 1 AND completion_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceRecord WHERE drone_id = 10 AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_name = 'Update firmware';
